Begin by loading required packages.
```{r}
library(arrow)
```

Read the Parquet file from the file path.
```{r}
cust_churn_df <- read_parquet("customer_churn_data.parquet")

str(cust_churn_df)
```

```{r}
head(cust_churn_df)
```
